name: APPALACHIAN TRAIL CONSERVANCY
sampleDescriptions: The Appalachian Trail Conservancy (ATC) is a non-profit organization that manages and maintains the Appalachian National Scenic Trail, a unit of the National Park Service. To that end, ATC engages on
